project.name: MapComplete Facade gardens
project.description: This map shows facade gardens with pictures and useful info about orientation, sunshine and plant types.
project.contact_name: Pieter Vander Vennet, joost schouppe; stla

tags.description: The MapComplete theme Facade gardens has a layer Facade gardens showing features with this tag
The MapComplete theme Facade gardens has a layer Facade gardens showing features with this tag

The layer 'Facade gardens allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'Facade gardens allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'Facade gardens allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'Facade gardens allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary
Layer 'Facade gardens' shows and asks freeform values for key 'direction' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Facade gardens')
Layer 'Facade gardens' shows direct_sunlight=yes with a fixed text, namely 'The garden is in full sun' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Facade gardens')

Layer 'Facade gardens' shows direct_sunlight=partial with a fixed text, namely 'The garden is in partial shade' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Facade gardens')
Layer 'Facade gardens' shows direct_sunlight=no with a fixed text, namely 'The sun is in the shade' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Facade gardens')
Layer 'Facade gardens' shows rain_barrel=yes with a fixed text, namely 'There is a rain barrel' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Facade gardens')
Layer 'Facade gardens' shows rain_barrel=no with a fixed text, namely 'There is no rain barrel' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Facade gardens')
Layer 'Facade gardens' shows and asks freeform values for key 'start_date' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Facade gardens')
Layer 'Facade gardens' shows edible=yes with a fixed text, namely 'There are edible plants' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Facade gardens')
Layer 'Facade gardens' shows edible=no with a fixed text, namely 'There are no edible plants' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Facade gardens')
Layer 'Facade gardens' shows plant=vine with a fixed text, namely 'There are vines' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Facade gardens')
Layer 'Facade gardens' shows plant=flower with a fixed text, namely 'There are flowering plants' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Facade gardens')
Layer 'Facade gardens' shows plant=shrub with a fixed text, namely 'There are shrubs' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Facade gardens')

Layer 'Facade gardens' shows plant=groundcover with a fixed text, namely 'There are groundcovering plants' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Facade gardens')
Layer 'Facade gardens' shows and asks freeform values for key 'description' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Facade gardens')
